10: Top: Damage test at all times
10_s0: Start state
10_s1: start
10_s1_e0: [Operation] Lock on
10_s1_e1: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
10_s1_w0: [Search enemy] Character _ target setting
10_s2: Initial setting
10_s2_e0: [General] lower-level state map switching
10_s3: Lower state switching
20: Lower: Always damage test
20_s0: Start state
20_s1: start
20_s2: Always damage ON1
20_s2_e0: [Attack] Resident damage type setting
20_s3: Always damage ON2
20_s3_e0: [Attack] Resident damage type setting
20_s4: Always damage ON3
20_s4_e0: [Attack] Resident damage type setting
